name: Space Hook
description:
Space Hook

Hook the islands to escape from the toxic cloud !

HOOK THE ISLAND

You can hook the islands. This gives you a boost that allows you to escape from the toxic cloud.

COLLECT THE COINS

Hit the treasure islands (marked with a scope) to blow them up and collect coins that increase your score.

BOOM

If you hit the bomb islands they’ll explode and you will lose the game.

ATTENTION

Go fast to escape the cloud. If you stop to think too long, the toxic cloud will reach you. Hurry!

CREDITS

Concept Design: Keb1t, Whoisashe

Programmer: Keb1t

Art Director: Whoisashe

Special to OpheliaShi
